pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: J. Willard Marriott Library, Special Collections, University of Utah
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Papers span Farr's career in broadcasting, 1935-1984, including KDYL in Salt Lake City, KPO in San Francisco where he was associated with the Valley of the Moon program, and later KEEN, San Jose, CA, the first of a network of radio stations he managed throughout the West and Pacific Coast area.
